name: abstraction (Soliloquy)
description:
Nothing.

Made for the Beans Game Jam 2022 on starmen.net in RPG Maker XP

Everything done by Soliloquy

PROTIP: In the first section of the game, I recommend going down from the start point, there's some dialogue that you might wanna read! Once you get to the big room and the music changes, you can go in whatever direction you want.

If you're interested in listening to the music I made for this project, you can download it for free here: https://dreamlesssoliloquy.bandcamp.com
